attributes.action: Report The Circumstances As To Why Jon Venables is back in Incarceration
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Because of the circumstances and conditions set when Jon Venables was released, it is imperative that we know what the reason why Jon Venables broke the terms of his release. 

It does not break any security conditions, and will inform the community so there is not unnecessary upset as to what he has done.

rejection.details: This Office cannot comment on individual cases.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
